results.description:
Have you ever felt like you keep attracting the wrong relationships in your life?

Do you ever feel anxious or not good enough for a person before you even meet or talk to them?

Have you ever felt drained energetically, used, betrayed, abused emotionally, mentally, physically, or sexually in any way in your intimate relationships, friends, family, or even co-workers?


Have you ever dreamed of having an amazing, intimate, passionate relationship but feel you just can't seem to attract the right one, almost like you have the worst luck?


If you answered yes to any or all of the above questions then this group is definitely for you!


I decided to start this group because I noticed so many people including myself at a point in time constantly attract the wrong relationships/people into our lives.


The purpose of this group is to understand the mystery of why these people come into our lives, how to recognize who they are before it's too late, and finally, how to replace these attraction patterns with amazing healthy, positive, supportive, loving, passionate relationships!

 Yes!, you can have and or transform your existing relationship(s) into the the most amazing relationship you've ever dreamed of! This is a promise!


Throughout these meetups you'll learn how you attract the most amazing people & how you literally have the power to change this attraction pattern to support your dream relationship(s). You'll literally see instant results from this new awareness, & the amazing techniques, tools, and processes I'll be teaching.


Are you ready to learn the most amazing, powerful secrets to attracting your dream relationships now? Don't you deserve relationships that add laughter, love, inspiration, passion, & deep empowering lasting connections to your life? Aren't you worth it?


Attending this meetup could seriously & possibly be the best decision you've ever made in your life! I'm SO excited to share these life changing secrets and look forward to meeting all who attend.


Matthew

Find out more about Matthew at www.matthewcroteau.com
results.name: Baltimore Relationship Attraction Mastery

results.description:
This group is focused on collectively creating the life you would like to experience more of. We use Reiki,Prayer,Meditation,Crystals, Intuition and Intention to create magic in our world. In order to experience the joy you seek on the outside you must get clear on what's going on in your inside. This group is a place to receive honest feedback on why your life is not working the way you want it to and how it can be better in the future. Get clear, focused and divinely guided advice from your Spirit Guides and Angels so you can grow. We are metaphysically based and use a variety of spiritual tools to consciously create joy,prosperity and peace. If this sounds like something you would like to be a part of then welcome! All that is required is a open heart, a open mind and honest participation. Grow or go!

Please check out our message board for more inspiration!
results.name: Live The Light

results.description:
Are you interested in smart homes, wearables, and other new technology? DAASN is hosting monthly meetups at its Towson office to discuss the future of technology and the Internet of Things. We would like to discuss and explore topics such as wearables, smart software and hardware solutions, robotics, smart cities and much more. This is a great chance to learn, discuss, and network in the technology community.

Join us on January 25th at 10am at the DAASN office:

31 Allegheny Ave. Suite 302

Towson, MD 21204


For questions please email Tom@daasn.com
results.name: DAASN and The Internet of Things

results.description:
. We will be meeting up at dining establishments a few times a month. Cocktails will be served first.
-If you do not drink this is still a good time to socialize and meet new people who naturally love food and like things- After fraternizing, we will give you the ability to sample new food at low prices outside the traditional restaurant experience. The supper club is fantastic for networking, getting jobs, contacts and even romance. Whether you’re bringing together friends or looking to make new ones The advantage lies in that you have time to get to know other people and a fun way to meet new people.
results.name: Baltimore Social Club

results.description:
Sponsored by the DC Public Library, this is a group for people who want to learn how to do things they've wanted to learn how to do. Do you want to... grow your own food? Mend a torn shirt? Bake bread? Unclog a sink? Use a power drill? Think of all those old-school skills that we don't learn anymore... that's what this group is about.
Each month, we'll explore a skill or set of skills that will empower us to take care of ourselves and each other. We will use books from the library, online tools, and learning from members of the community.
Come learn with us!

And check out more library programs at www.dclibrary.org/southeast
results.name: DC Know How

results.description: This is a group for anyone interested in expanding their portfolio and increasing their network in the business of real estate and investing. All skills levels are welcome. We started this group because we would like to meet other individuals that are interested in increasing opportunities in Real Estate investments. We are looking forward to exploring the growing opportunities in Maryland, Delaware, Virginia, Pennsylvania, Washington, DC and surrounding areas with like minded members.
results.name: Property Investors Network

results.description: Join world renowned zombie scholar and podcaster Dr. Arnold T. Blumberg ("The Doctor of the Dead"), professor of "Zombies in Popular Media" at the University of Baltimore and co-author of ZOMBIEMANIA, for a fun gathering of the undead horde! Zombie movies, TV, comics, books, games, and much more - it's all apocalypse all the time! Hopefully we can build an ongoing horror and zombie fan community in good ol' Baltimore and see where it goes from there!
results.name: The Doctor of the Dead's Zombiemania Apoca-Meetup!

results.description: This group will provide our community with an array of excellent opportunities to grow, expand the mind/body consciousness, and to heal in a creative and supportive environment. Multiple times per month, we will bring various dynamic group leaders and teachers to provide curriculum that includes practical spirituality, meditation, body movement, reiki, tai chi, Nia Technique, principles of Shamanism, and endless diverse topics. In addition this group will offer CE's for Massage Therapists providing ethics, diversity, bodywork techniques, and multiple continuing education courses. The intention of the group is to encourage the community to connect and support each other in creating peace and balance within the heart and mind.
results.name: Columbia Creative Growth and Healing @ The Face Place

results.description: We produce monthly Music concerts and Play Time with amazing musicians who are kid-friendly. We love a good concert and love to take our kids, but unfortunately there just isn't anything like this in annapolis. Come check out music and a Lego play-time the first Saturday of every month.
results.name: Annapolis Juice Box Jams Kids Concerts and Play Time.

results.description: OneCircle Center for Spirituality and the Arts hosts awakened non-duality teachers from all over the world. OneCircle also schedule house concerts with musical groups, drum circles, workshops on the Dances of Universal Peace, healing and other events. OneCircle is centered around a monthly interactive universal workshop service.
results.name: OneCircle Center

results.description: This is a Futsal group that will meet up for pick-up Futsal at the brand new Odenton Sports Center (8266 Lokus rd. Odenton, MD). Futsal is a fast indoor soccer game played on a court with a smaller ball that promotes more creativity and technical ability. Though pick-up cost is $5, this meetup group will serve as a means for those who have an interest in learning and playing more futsal to meet and create a group in a local community. Flat are required as this is a brand new Taraflex hard court that is easy on the knees. Days will vary from later weekday nights to various weekend times. Anyone may attempt to coordinate a game and a court can even be reserved for free if there are enough players from the group. Hope to see you on the court!
results.name: Odenton Futsal Meetup

results.description: Gay Texans and friends in the Baltimore/DC area. A social group of gay Texans and their friends primarily to learn and go out 2-step dancing.
results.name: Baltimore/DC Gay Texans Meetup

results.description: Do you enjoy listening to local live music? Then this might just be the group for you! This Meetup group is for music lovers like me who enjoy going out to hear local bands in the Baltimore/Annapolis area and are interested in meeting other music lovers while supporting local bands in the process.
results.name: Baltimore/Annapolis Local Music Lovers

results.description:
One World by Night (OWbN) is a non profit network of international Live Action Role Play (LARP) chronicles. These chronicles are brought together for the purpose of sharing a broad and colorful story that extends past each city's borders.  The chronicles that are represented in this community represent the following games:

Baltimore By Night: Dark Harbor - A Camarilla Vampire LARP

Baltimore Imbued: the Charmed Hunt - An Imbued Hunter LARP

Philadelphia Nusquam - A Camarilla Vampire LARP

Quoth the Raven - A Werewolf the Apocalypse LARP

Vitae Aeternus - A Camarilla Vampire LARP
results.name: Mid-Atlantic One World by Night Chronicles

results.description: For intermediate to advanced tennis players looking for a fun way to meet other people with the same interest in the same age range. This meetup will be held indoors at Whitley Park for 3 hours where players can rotate in and out playing with different partners. All participants are encouraged to meet at the league sponsor, Brickside Bar and Restaurant in down town Bethesda, afterwards.
results.name: Bethesda, Sets in the City, Ages 21-35

topics.name: Hanging Out and Meeting New People

results.description: Come and join us for a fun Middle Eastern Night full of delicious food, hookahs, and dancing on ME music beats!
results.name: Arabian Nights in DMV!

results.description: This group is for women that want what God has for them in a mate and refuse to settle for anything less than His best for them! In this group we will have bible study, attend workshops and engage in social outings such as dining out at least once every 4- 6 weeks. Our focus will be understanding our "Season of Singleness" and its importance, and becoming the Proverbs 31 Woman. We are simply about empowering women with tools to help them maintain a life pleasing to God while in their singleness! "Charm is deceitful and beauty is passing, but a woman who fears the Lord, she shall be praised". Proverbs 31:30 - NKJV
results.name: Waiting For Boaz: DMV Single Christian Women Meetup

results.description: This group is for anyone who is interested in meeting other singles throughout DC, Maryland, and Virginia. There will be speed dating, social mixers, and other events to bring singles together for fun, new friends, dating, and networking!
results.name: DMV Singles in the City

results.description: We're dedicated to bringing the jiu-jitsu community together and expanding its size within Maryland. For that purpose, our focus will be on creating events that allow members to meet, learn from each other and advance the art. There will be seminars, open mats, gym invites, and other local events. Also feel free to use this forum to discuss the art and share knowledge. The group is open to all, even if you've never trained before. We can introduce you to what makes Jiu-jitsu awesome.
results.name: Maryland Brazilian Jiu-jitsu Network

results.description: This group is for African Americans who are 40+, live in the Baltimore/Washington area, and love to travel. Planned trips will be extended weekend getaways. Hotels selected will typically be 4 to 5 star hotels and flights selected will be through BWI airport. Members are free to make travel arrangements through any travel agency or online travel service of their choice. Trips for 2015 and 2016 include Atlanta; Honolulu; Las Vegas; St Thomas, US Virgin Islands; New York City; and Houston.   Past trips include South Beach.  All members must have a personal photo on their profile so everyone can put a face to a name.
results.name: 40+ Black Travel

results.description: Maryland Social Group does everything from a Happy Hour to a helping hand for when you move. This group was created for the same reason Meetup was created – to build a sense of community. With the DC area being such a transient community and as a transplant myself, I’ve gone through the cycle of making good friends only to see them move to another city several times. The group is diverse and our ages range from 21 to 60. Our community is open to everyone, but most people reside along or near the Route 1 corridor (aka Baltimore Avenue or Washington Blvd) in Maryland (Ellicott City, Columbia*, Elkridge, Burtonsville, Beltsville, Catonsville, Laurel, Jessup, Maryland City, Hyattsville, Greenbelt, Bowie, College Park, Silver Spring). Our community includes single, married, and those with families. We do a variety of activities (HH, shopping, Guys or Girls’ Night Out, pet sitting, play dates for kids, traveling, game nights, book club, ride to airport, etc.) As always, you should be cautious and meet in public first. Everyone will need to post a photo. If three members complain, you will be removed from the group. The bottom line is if you are young at heart, active, and looking for friends or to expand your circle of friends, you have found the right place.
results.name: Maryland Social Group

results.description:
Welcome fellow journeyers and those interested in exploring this exciting new frontier of human consciousness! The purpose of this group will be to lend support to those who are undergoing transformation and healing from ayahuasca and other plant based psychedelic medicine, as well as to provide information to those who are interested in taking their first steps along the path.

Facilitators also include Yoga and Acupuncture Practitioners and events will expand to include Indoor and Outdoor events to reflect different presentations.

Alliances as of Summer 2015 include swimming and exercise groups with indoor and outdoor facilities to meet
results.name: Plant Discussions and Health Living Collaborative of MD!

topics.name: How to Pass the CPA Exam

results.description: We will meet regularly to prepare to pass the CPA exam.
results.name: Baltimore  CPA Exam Study Meetup

results.description:
It’s a new year Owings Mills community. Let’s start this year by meeting our neighbors, working with our public officials and simply enjoy living In & Around Owings Mills. 

We have a wealth of diversity and culture within our community but we need to bring it to the forefront in 2015. Great communities start with strong resident engagement and involvement in designing the ideal community that highlights our strengths and reshapes our challenges. 

Why should we have to travel to Columbia, downtown Baltimore and Towson to enjoy arts and culture, shopping, hiking and adult and family entertainment? This Meetup is unique because our goal is to be a community force guiding Owings Mills residents in promoting community development by building strong community bonds by: 

• supporting local businesses and retailers, 

• educating and working with pubic officials, and 

• strengthening families by creating a safe, healthy and happy community of residents! 

Let’s brainstorm to host a multitude of events, community meetings, family activities, health groups, and special interests to premiere Owings Mills as the next Best Community on the East Coast.
results.name: In & Around Owings Mills

results.description:
This is the fun group that you want to be in! We're a fun group of outgoing, down to earth, adventurous professionals who live in Anne Arundel County and want to make new friends while exploring the area. Members range in age from 25-43.

Together, we'll enjoy a variety of activities including music, arts, nightlife, dinners, happy hours, festivals, concerts, sporting events, fitness, local hikes, movies, game nights, trivia nights, cooking and potluck parties, wine & beer tastings/tours, occasional day trips and travel, etc.

The purpose of this group is to make new friends and have a good time. If that sounds like something you would enjoy, please join us! 

Member Rules:

1) To be considered for membership, your profile MUST include an ACTUAL PHOTO of yourself so we can recognize you at events.

2) If you act rude or are disrespectful to members in the group, you will be removed from the group! You have to treat members with R-E-S-P-E-C-T! :)
results.name: Anne Arundel Social Professionals

results.description:
Meetup for anyone curious about hypnosis/hypnotherapy and how to accomplish goals using Hypnosis. This group will look at hypnosis, neuro-linguistic programming, integrative coaching and how they are used for change work, improving health and wellness, eradicating habits, etc.  During our meetings we will discuss a different topic such as self-hypnosis, the history of hypnosis, stress relief, weight loss, smoking cessation, anxiety, fears, regression, forgiveness, peak performance at work, in school, etc. 

Although we will gather at various locations in and around Columbia/Ellicott City, most of the meetings will be held at my downtown Columbia, MD off just across the street from The Mall in Columbia. While mostly a discussion group, it will also contain experiential elements and demonstrations, sessions (sometimes for a nominal/low cost). 

We may bring in guest speakers and ask other local hypnotists/hypnotherapists to visit and speak. 

Note that the Meetup service is a social media site, and your RSVP becomes public to this list and other potential attendees. If you would like to speak or share a topic request for an upcoming meeting, please contact Racquel A. Knight at (443) 686-9645.
results.name: Hypnosis Columbia-Ellicott City Meetup

results.description: The Columbia-Area Linux Users Group (CALUG) is a friendly informal group of Columbia-area residents and workers who share an interest in Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) in general, and Linux in particular. The CALUG meets at 7:00PM on the second Wednesday of each month at the Fulton offices of OmniTI. Like the software that interests us, our meetings are free - and open to everyone.
results.name: Columbia Area Linux Users Group

results.description:
*** BESS is an established social group with most of our events averaging 10-40 people. You can find tons more information at http://www.bess-md.org/ and via our presence on FetLife ***

BESS is an educational and social group for consenting adults with shared interests in BDSM. These interests include, among others, Dominance & submission, bondage & discipline, leathersex, fetishism, cross dressing, and roleplay. 

BESS is multi-sexual. All genders and orientations are welcome to attend. 

Our goal is to provide a safe, friendly, and discreet environment for the education and encouragement of adults interested in Safe, Sane, and Consensual expressions of BDSM.

BESS Contributorships, Educational Meetings, Socials, and SIGs are open to anyone, age 19 or older, with a sincere interest in some aspect of BDSM. BESS is a not-for-profit 501(c)7 organization. We are NOT a sex or swingers club. We are NOT a dating service. We do NOT make referrals.
results.name: BESS - Baltimore Educational and Social Society

results.description: We are advocates for healthy hair and we are in constant pursuit to educate women on the importance of adopting a healthy hair care regimen for natural and relaxed hair. We will provide support on your hair journey by way of offering hair care tips and offering advice to those that may be experiencing damaged tresses, thinning hair or hair loss. We will be offering informational seminars, hands-on training seminars and local events for a fee. We are here to help you become more educated so that you can make the right decisions for your hair. We will arrange interactive meetings throughout the DMV area. This group is operated by a license Cosmetologist/Hair Transformation Specialist/Educator and we have assembled a team of professionals who are highly skilled, committed and believe in our mission that will speak on various topics. This group is for women that are searching for a beauty professional to aid them on a successful hair care journey for a positive change. This group is for beauty professionals that are interested in the movement. And for those that is interested in becoming a part of the hair industry and would like to be trained by us. Feel free to visit our web site: www.sonyamichellehairspa.com
results.name: Saving Our Strands (S.O.S.) ™ Movement Hair Group (DMV)

results.description: The Annapolis Morning Song Circle (AM Song Circle), directed by vocalist Elizabeth Melvin, invites new and experienced singers to come together for the pure joy of making beautiful vocal music together. No audition is required, and no music-reading experience necessary. The repertoire is eclectic and fun, drawing from world, folk, gospel and traditional music. You will be amazed at how quickly you'll be immersed in the thrill of singing in three- and four-part harmony.
results.name: Annapolis Morning Song Circle

results.description: Brewtherville Labs is a community of homebrewers and craft brew lovers dedicated to learning and expanding the art and science of homebrewing and the appreciation of great beer. Lab members include craft beer lovers, homebrewing novices and experienced all-grain master brewers.
results.name: Brewtherville Labs Homebrew Club

results.description: This group is for the "young at heart" interested in traveling near and far with a group of like minded travel enthusiasts. We will have various planning meetings throughout the year to create our travel bucket list, which could include cruises and tours. This group is open to all who enjoy traveling and making new friends along the way.
results.name: Maryland and Virginia Young at Heart Travelers

results.description: Original Nourishment is a place to learn how the wisdom of nature, the knowledge of science, and the art of traditional healing tie in to our nutritional wellbeing.  Come explore your body's innate ability to heal in a safe and nurturing environment.  Listen to seminars, taste delicious food, and participate in stimulating conversation.
results.name: Original Nourishment

results.description:
Welcome to a group for all ages, multicultural and diverse! We love to have fun, learn and share in ideas. Everyone is welcome as long as you're nice, open minded and want to get out more! In this group, there are no strangers just friends who haven't met yet.

Our activities will include affordable galleries/museums, shows, and fun dance classes.

I'd really like for us to explore DC, Maryland and Virginia metro areas.

Please try to be  as active and sociable as possible. You never know who your next friend might be.

Feel free to make suggestions at our meet and greets or send me a message!
results.name: ADVENTURE in DC

results.description:
This is a group for anyone interested in crochet, knitting, tatting, sewing, or general crafting. We'll start off with a monthly "Stitch and Bitch" for any crocheters or knitters to get together and work on their current projects, get advice, inspire and share resources. As the group grows we'll include other types of crafting events. If you have a craft that you'd like to share or teach, suggest a meetup date/time/location and it will become an event once three people sign up.

We'll be meeting on the first Saturday and the third Wednesday of the month for a "Stitch & Bitch."  The Saturday location will vary month to month, but our Wednesday Meetup will take place at the Abingdon Wegman's.
results.name: Harford Handmade

results.description: This meetup group, coordinated through the Office of Cyber Development at the MD Department of Business & Economic Development, is designed to bring professionals from Maryland's cybersecurity and technology community together in an INFORMAL environment for SOCIALIZING and NETWORKING. Never an agenda. No fee to join/attend. Simply pay for whatever you order to eat and drink at the venue during the meetups.  Meetups will be hosted at varying locations throughout the state. They're all about mixing and mingling and getting to know who's who in Maryland's cybersecurity and technology eco-system. Join us for the fun. Feel free to invite others to attend. You never know who you'll meet and the business opportunities that may present themselves!
results.name: MD Cyber Community Meetup

results.description: a community for community and social media managers in the D.C. area.
results.name: DC Community Managers Meetup

results.description:
Hi everyone,

I'm stepping down, but hopefully one of you will step up as organizer!

Best regards.
results.name: Together We Prevent & Manage Diabetes

results.description: This group is for GLBT Asians coupled with Americans who want to get together with other committed couples for social, entertainment, and other events around Maryland. We are not for singles.
results.name: MD GLBT Asian/American Couples

results.description:
This meetup group is dedicated to young  people (ages 25-35)  who are interested in fun and exciting activities around the DMV.

Join us for happy hours, brunch, live music, festivals, gallery parties, pool tournaments, karaoke, pub crawls, special events, and so much more! So, if you enjoy eating, drinking, browsing and generally enjoying all the fun things that happen in and around the DMV, then this is the group for you! 

Please note: This group is for everyone who enjoys life in the DMV! House Rules: We are not bothered about no-shows at large, free events. If you RSVP but then cant make it in the end, no problem - we understand these things happen. However: If you RSVP for small events with limited spaces and do not attend, you will be subject to removal from group.
results.name: 25-35 Urban Social Group! DC/MD

results.description:
Our primary focus is to visit and experience the beauty of the United States East Coast, right here in our own back yard from Canada to Florida.  But, don't be surprised if we venture to other locals as well!!   It's all up to what interests' you!

In the mean time... There will be lots of other events and activities posted to share and do!  We can meetup at various local venues, get to know one another and share fun times and travel ideas.

Keep checking back often to see what we have in store and remember it is important to PARTICIPATE!!  :)
results.name: Baltimore East Coast Travel & Events Meetup

results.description: This group is for anyone is their 20s or 30s looking to meet new people and make new friends. From dinner out to live concerts to charity events, we are open to a variety of activities. If you are looking for a more relaxed group that is not about the party scene or big trips, this is the group for you! We look forward to meeting you!
results.name: HoCo 20s and 30s Socials

results.description:
Decrease your stress and increase your vitality! Improve your balance, health, body awareness and discover a new way to transform the quality of your life through movement. The movements are slow and gentle and have a profound impact on the whole person - body, mind, and spirit. Classes are open to all adults and all fitness levels, no prior experience is necessary.

There are several local Feldenkrais instructors in this group (look for the co-organizers).  Please feel free to be in touch with us with any questions about Feldenkrais Method.  In addition to the events on this group's calendar, most of us offer private Functional Integration and/or Awareness Through Movement sessions, so please be in touch if you are interested!
results.name: DC Metro Feldenkrais Method® Meetup

results.description:
Place for Baltimore area folks to share ideas and activities related to the mission of the Institute of Noetic Sciences. We are interested in the mysteries and the extraordinary potential of consciousness.

If you would like to join the group, please send an email to Jane, janenankelly@msn.com explaining your interest. We require this to prevent spammers from spoiling the experience for our members.

More information may be found at www.baltimoreions.org and 

https://www.facebook.com/groups/BaltimoreIONS/

Join us for vibrant discussions every month and an engaging book club every other month. The times and dates of the meetings are generally:

Discussion Group: 7:00-8:30 pm, 2nd Tuesday of the month

Book Club: 7:00–8:30 pm, 3rd Tuesday of every OTHER month

Meetings are held at the Center for Spiritual Living, 362 Main Street, Reisterstown, MD, 21136.  There is plenty of free parking in the lot at the back of the building.  Our group hosts an annual gathering and occasional field trips, as well.

We say “Friends of IONS” because our group follows the work of the nationally based Institute of Noetic Sciences (www.Noetic.org) founded by astronaut Edgar Mitchell. Please visit their website to learn more.

The mission of the national organization is:
“Broadening our knowledge of the nature and potentials of mind and consciousness and applying that knowledge to enhancing human well-being and the quality of life on the planet.”

Given the wide range of topics and opinions that are presented and discussed during our activities, it may not surprise you that IONS notes that “Views expressed by speakers, workshop leaders and participants do not necessarily reflect the views of IONS or anyone associated with The Institute of Noetic Sciences” which, in other words, means that we foster diverse and open-minded conversations, enough that someone is bound to take an opposing view or even not like what is said!

And, unfortunately, in a litigious society, we also must share that Baltimore Friends of IONS is wholly independent of the Institute of Noetic Sciences and is legally and financially responsible for its own activities.

Enough said, now please enjoy the rest of our site and take part in our activities.
results.name: Baltimore Friends of IONS

results.description: We are a group that discusses questions in the Socratic way of examining the question for built-in assumptions. We meet to learn from each other's perspectives.
results.name: Socrates Cafe - Arundel Mills Area

results.description:
“Il bel far niente means 'the beauty of doing nothing'... [it] has always been a cherished Italian ideal. The beauty of doing nothing is the goal of all your work, the final accomplishment for which you are most highly congratulated. The more exquisitely and delightfully you can do nothing, the higher your life's achievement. You don't necessarily need to be rich in order to experience this, either.”~ Elizabeth Gilbert, Eat, Pray, Love 

This group is for anyone interested in having fun and meeting awesome peeps to travel through this life with. If you are interested in eating, praying, loving, dancing, traveling, talking circles, hiking, biking, road trips, watching trees grow and other fun activities come join me on this awesome ride called LIFE. Together we will ENABLE ourselves and others to accomplish the goal of embodying 'Il bel far niente' ....and we'll have fun doing it.


“The mystery of life isn't a problem to solve, but a reality to experience.” ― Frank Herbert, Dune
results.name: The Art of Doing Nothing

#MeetupMonday gives us a chance to discuss what's happening—in our neighborhoods and all across the US—so we can come together and build a stronger community.

Invite neighbors or coworkers you want to know better, friends, and anyone who wants to bring their own perspective to the conversation.

results.description:
Let's talk about our neighborhood and our nation.

#MeetupMonday gives us a chance to discuss what's happening—in our neighborhoods and all across the US—so we can come together and build a stronger community.

Invite neighbors or coworkers you want to know better, friends, and anyone who wants to bring their own perspective to the conversation.

For the latest tips and topics, see the #MeetupMonday Discussion Guides.
